Comments_List: I learned a lot about the basics of cancer biology, which is important as I will be completing my thesis research in a cancer biology laboratory.
Fundamental knowledge about the major hallmarks of cancer and about the therapeutic strategies that are being employed to target these hallmarks.
I learned about: Critical thinking, Current research on the field, analyzing scientific literature
Better communication by TA's about the content and format of quizzes.

Strengths: lecturers were great, professors were helpful, slides were useful

Weaknesses: JC did not feel engaging and too much required reading material (should pick 1-2 best representative articles to make reading more feasible)
Yes, this course was fantastic and I really enjoyed learning about the basics of cancer biology. I think this course is pivotal for students interested in cancer biology.
Yes, it provides a good review of fundamental cancer biology, and good for any graduate student studying cancer.
yes. Great course to learn an overview on cancer bio.
